title: Navaratna Studs - A Symphony of Gemstones
materials: 134 stones). Hyderabadi Polish for lasting luster.
features: A classic Navaratna design featuring a central oval cut emerald surrounded by a halo of glittering diamonds and a ring of nine auspicious gemstones. The design is inspired by traditional South Indian temple jewelry (Gudi Jewellers). Detailed gold framework adds to the elegance and creates a delicate filigree effect.
colors: Cat's Eye Green. A vibrant and auspicious color palette following traditional Navaratna principles.
occasions: Suitable for festivals like Ugadi and Dussehra
or a special gift for any auspicious occasion. A perfect everyday statement piece
and can be dressed up for formal parties as well.
description: A timeless design with deep cultural significance. The Navaratna arrangement is believed to bring good fortune and prosperity to the wearer. Exquisite craftsmanship using high-quality gemstones and pure 22K gold ensures lasting beauty and value. Perfect blend of tradition and modern design. The earrings feature fine quality diamonds adding brilliance and shine to the overall design. They are crafted using traditional Hyderabadi techniques making them special and unique.
